text: Amyrmex golbachi is a species of ant. It is currently the only known species of ant of the genus Amyrmex described from Argentina. == References == * Ward P., & Brady S. Rediscovery of the ant genus Amyrmex Kusnezov (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) and its transfer from Dolichoderinae to Leptanilloidinae. // "Zootaxa", 2009, Volume 2063, pp. 46â€“54. ==Other websites== * Antweb Category:Ants
title: Amyrmex golbachi
